content: **more languages ** danish 1 norwegian 2 swedish 3 french 4 german 5 a beautiful and simple **shawl** crocheted in the well-known granny pattern which is a super easy technique and thus perfect for beginners or as a relaxing project while watching tv - the shawl is worked in cotton kings sultan which is a gorgeous cake-yarn in 100% cotton the yarn consists of 4 thin and untwined strands with beautiful slow color transitions which makes it perfect for this project happy crocheting 1 https //hobbii dk/granny-shawl-version-1-sultan utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern/tine-sommer-hansen&utm_content=granny-shawl-version-1+hbtrack&utm_term=karen 2 https //hobbii no/granny-shawl-version-1-sultan utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern/tine-sommer-hansen&utm_content=granny-shawl-version-1+hbtrack&utm_term=karen 3 https //hobbii se/granny-shawl-version-1-sultan utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern/tine-sommer-hansen&utm_content=granny-shawl-version-1+hbtrack&utm_term=karen 4 https //hobbii fr/granny-shawl-version-1-sultan utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern/tine-sommer-hansen&utm_content=granny-shawl-version-1+hbtrack&utm_term=karen 5 https //hobbii de/granny-shawl-version-1-sultan utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern/tine-sommer-hansen&utm_content=granny-shawl-version-1+hbtrack&utm_term=karen
